So the 30s out in 16 aug 2400 contracts were added net over yesterday with another 50 hundred volume today out here at the 40s. There's 12,000, oh, I 1500 added 3677 volume today. So people are scaling into these positions like that's very, very clear to me. And it's centralized in the standard expiration cycles 19 July 16 August. That's where most of this stuff are. As you guys can tell, I tend to put my positions a little further out. I took the 18 October is down today because they showed a sizeable profits. I went very deep in the money. I had those for a while now as you can tell I'm not using the pass through account for this one mostly because I wanted to make the joke about this. Hey, we don't like that.
